Class CelebrityGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • CelebrityGame
  • public class CelebrityGame
extends java.lang.Object
    The framework for the Celebrity Game project

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CelebrityGame()
      Builds the game and starts the GUI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Adds a Celebrity of specified type to the game list

      Accessor method for the current size of the list of celebrities

      Asserts that the list is initialized and contains at least one Celebrity.
      void prepareGame()
      Prepares the game to start by re-initializing the celebGameList and having the gameFrame open the start screen.

      Determines if the supplied guess is correct.
      java.lang.String sendAnswer()
      Accessor method for the games answer to maintain low coupling between classes

      Accessor method for the games clue to maintain low coupling between classes

      Validates the name of the celebrity.
      boolean validateClue​(java.lang.String clue, java.lang.String type)
      Checks that the supplied clue has at least 10 characters or is a series of clues This method would be expanded based on your subclass of Celebrity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CelebrityGame

        public CelebrityGame()
        Builds the game and starts the GUI

    • Method Detail

      • prepareGame

        public void prepareGame()
        Prepares the game to start by re-initializing the celebGameList and having the gameFrame open the start screen.

      • processGuess

        public boolean processGuess​(java.lang.String guess)
        Determines if the supplied guess is correct.
        Parameters:
        guess - The supplied String
        Returns:
        Whether it matches regardless of case or extraneous external spaces.

      • play

        public void play()
        Asserts that the list is initialized and contains at least one Celebrity. Sets the current celebrity as the first item in the list. Opens the game play screen.

      • addCelebrity

        public void addCelebrity​(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String guess,
                         java.lang.String type)
        Adds a Celebrity of specified type to the game list
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the celebrity
        guess - The clue(s) for the celebrity
        type - What type of celebrity

      • validateCelebrity

        public boolean validateCelebrity​(java.lang.String name)
        Validates the name of the celebrity. It must have at least 4 characters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Celebrity
        Returns:
        If the supplied Celebrity is valid

      • validateClue

        public boolean validateClue​(java.lang.String clue,
                            java.lang.String type)
        Checks that the supplied clue has at least 10 characters or is a series of clues This method would be expanded based on your subclass of Celebrity.
        Parameters:
        clue - The text of the clue(s)
        type - Supports a subclass of Celebrity
        Returns:
        If the clue is valid.

      • getCelebrityGameSize

        public int getCelebrityGameSize()
        Accessor method for the current size of the list of celebrities
        Returns:
        Remaining number of celebrities

      • sendClue

        public java.lang.String sendClue()
        Accessor method for the games clue to maintain low coupling between classes
        Returns:
        The String clue from the current celebrity.

      • sendAnswer

        public java.lang.String sendAnswer()
        Accessor method for the games answer to maintain low coupling between classes
        Returns:
        The String answer from the current celebrity.
